name: SimSewer 2027
description:
A short student project I put together very quickly for a class in Gamification. My project was intended to gamify city planning, and I created this game to show what some mechanics for that game might include. In this "demo", the goal is to connect every building to both fresh water and waste water, but they cannot cross. There are a handful of levels with different building  configurations. Try to come in under budget!

It should be noted that while the game's full title is SimSewer 2027, I do not have copyrights to the Sim(s) franchise or the year 2027.
